title: Target announces a Lego collaboration that includes home goods, fashion and more
text:
The collection is composed of more than 300 items, most priced under $30.00.

See: Walmart, Target, Home Depot and other large retailers are chartering ships to bypass supply chain problems. Will the strategy save Christmas?

The Lego x Target Collection also includes items for the home. via TargetClothing comes in a wide range of sizes, including XXS to 4X for women and S to 5XLT for men. And there are adaptive items for children with features like flat seams and hidden openings.

Target TGT has launched the collection in time for the holidays, and the retailer kicked off the holiday shopping season this week with its Target Deal Days.

Target stock has gained 37.5% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX has gained 18% for the period.
